ing: 1 cup cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped
des: "Very easy and delicious!  I am constantly asked to bring this salad to parties and picnics.  The cheese and ham are key additions to an old favorite."
ins:
In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain.
In a large bowl, combine the pasta, mayonnaise and mix well. Stir in cucumber, onion, ham and cheese. Mix well. Drizzle oil and vinegar over top and toss. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
